title: ZED PLAYERS HELP WITH SKIN STRUGGLE
body: I am trying to decide what zeds skin to buy between skt shockblade and championship zed, I am not looking for looks or particles just how smooth the skin feels,  like project Lucian etc just feels better when you are playing,  anyone have some feedback?

replies.body:
Isn't championship legacy? I'm pretty sure you can't get it until worlds next year.

Championship is by far the best skin out of the three, but if I am right and it's a legacy, I would definitely go with shock blade. I personally dislike the look of shockblade Zed, but it feels good too play. And it has chromas, so that's always another reason too buy it over the others.

If I am mistaken however and championship zed is available, get that for sure. One of the best worlds skins made to date. 

But whatever you do don't buy skt for gods sake. It is one of the ugliest, worst skins made imo. Yuck.
Championship is the smoothest skt is no different to the normal, and shockblade is okay...
